Product.name: Signature Detergent
Product.description: We developed this product for those who are serious about caring for their clothes and linens. For all-purpose laundering, our Signature Detergent is perfectly formulated to tackle all your laundry challenges, combining surfactants, color guard and stain-fighting enzymes.
Product.short_description: We created our Signature Detergent for those who take their everyday laundering seriously. This all-purpose formula whitens, brightens, and preserves color while removing stains.
Product.more_description:
Travel Signature Detergent for Emergencies

If youre travelling, you never know when youll face a cashmere emergency. Never be empty handed with Signature Detergent, perfect for on the go touch ups. You can even get single use packets, ideal for stowing away in a handbag, travel bag or toiletry bag.

Save yourself an unnecessary trip to the gift shop with easy washes you can use on the go. Make business trips easier by being prepared with cashmere natural laundry products you can stow in your personals.
Product.meta_description: The Laundress is a collection of specialty detergents, fabric care and accessories for home, travel and storage.
Product.ingredients:
Plant-derived anionic and nonionic surfactants, stain-fighting and cleaning enzymes (protease, amylase, cellulase, lipase), mineral-derived cleaning enhancers (borax, sodium gluconate, and calcium chloride), essential oils and fragrance
Made with nontoxic, biodegradable, and allergen-free materials. Made with natural ingredients. Color and texture may vary. Free of petroleum, SLS, phosphate, phthalates, and dye. Cruelty-free. No animal by-products. All The Laundress products are tested on Gwen & Lindsey.
Product.for_best_results: Effective in all water temperatures. We recommend washing whites, light colors, and heavily soiled cotton or linen items in hot water. Wash darks, colors, and synthetic items in warm or cold water. Launder as follows: Additional Fabric Care To remove old and new stains, pretreat soiled areas with our Stain Solution or Wash & Stain Bar. For a laundry boost and extra whitening and brightening, add our color-safe All-Purpose Bleach Alternative. For extra softening, static control, and wrinkle reduction, follow with our Fabric Conditioner.

Product.name: Whites Detergent
Product.description: We know how hard it is to keep your daily whites white. Formulated with natural bleach alternative, surfactants, and stain-fighting enzymes, this product keeps your whites not only clean, but bright as new. This product may be used safely on colors.
Product.short_description: We know how hard it can be to keep your whites white. Fight dull, dingy-looking T-shirts, yellowing sheets, and other lacklusters with our knock-your-socks-off Whites Detergent. Safely brightens colors, too!
Product.more_description:
Ecofriendly Detergents that Don’t Compromise on Clean

There’s nothing like the freshness and scent of pearly white sheets, but keeping them white isn’t as easy as your mother made it look, especially if you care about the earth. Luckily, our Whites detergent is an ecofriendly detergent that will keep your whites as pure as the driven snow, as perfect as the moment they came out of the package. Don’t compromise on the sanctity of your whites or your environmental values. Use ecofriendly cleaning products that are easy on the environment, but hard on dirt.

 

Clean Whites with Natural Laundry Products

The days of washing your whites in toxic chemicals and wearing them against your skin are gone. Natural laundry products are our specialty at The Laundress. We believe that your clothing should be clean and stain-free without being exposed to harmful chemicals.

Our Whites Detergent exceeds all of your previous expectations of a great detergent—brightening whites, removing stains—without the use of toxic chemicals.
Product.meta_keyword: The Laundress Whites Detergent, Whites Detergent, Classic
Product.meta_description: The Laundress is a collection of specialty detergents, fabric care and accessories for home, travel and storage.
Product.ingredients:

Made with nontoxic, biodegradable, and allergen-free materials. Made with natural ingredients. Color and texture may vary. Free of petroleum, SLS, phosphate, phthalates, and dye. Cruelty-free. No animal by-products. All The Laundress products are tested on Gwen & Lindsey.
Product.for_best_results: For Best Results Effective in all water temperatures. We recommend washing cotton and linen items in hot water. Wash all other fabrics in warm water. Launder as follows: Additional Fabric Care To remove old and new stains, pretreat soiled areas with our Stain Solution or Wash & Stain Bar. For a laundry boost and extra whitening, add our All-Purpose Bleach Alternative. For extra softening, static control, and wrinkle reduction, follow with our Fabric Conditioner.
Product.washing_chart:
Pretreat Sort laundry before washing. Always wash white items together. It is best to wash and dry sheets and towels together, separate from everyday laundry. Pretreat stains with Stain Solution or the Wash & Stain Bar. Always treat stains first and pre-soak for the most effective removal. Pre-soak for super dingy whites. Make a bath of hot water and All-Purpose Bleach Alternative. Soak items for at least an hour.
Machine Wash Launder with hot water and Whites Detergent. Add All-Purpose Bleach Alternative directly to the drum of the washing machine.
Dry/Finish Do not dry any items that still have stains. Hang to dry on a line in the sun for energy efficiency, natural whitening and that fresh line experienceor use the dryer.

Product.name: All-Purpose Bleach Alternative
Product.description: We love to give our laundry and home an extra boost of clean. This nontoxic, biodegradable, and fragrance-free alternative to chlorine bleach works wonders to safely remove dirt, stains, and odors. Add to the wash cycle to whiten and brighten clothesits safe for colors. You can also use this single product to clean your entire homefloors, tiles, sinks, surfaces, and more.
Product.short_description: We love to give our laundry and home an extra boost of clean. This nontoxic, biodegradable, and fragrance-free alternative to chlorine bleach works wonders to safely remove dirt, stains, and odors.
Product.more_description:
Oxygenated Bleach: A Biodegradable Green Solution

Looking for oxygenated bleach thats safe for the environment and your clothes? Our All Purpose Bleach alternative uses non-toxic, biodegradable materials to provide a fragrance free alternative to chlorine bleach. It works great at removing odors, stains and dirt, without leaving behind that bleachy smell.

Mix the bleach alternative with our Detergents for added cleanliness. Enjoy a clean thats good for the earth but tough on stains.
Product.meta_description: Who needs bleach when youve got this fabulous, non-toxic, and biodegradable bleach alternative from The Laundress?
Product.ingredients:
Chlorine-free oxygen bleach (100% sodium percarbonate)
Made with nontoxic, biodegradable, and allergen-free materials. Made with natural ingredients. Color and texture may vary. Free of petroleum, SLS, phosphate, phthalates, and dye. Cruelty-free. No animal by-products. All The Laundress products are tested on Gwen & Lindsey.
Product.for_best_results: For Laundry: We recommend using with hot water. Add directly into the machine drum or detergent dispenser. Do not add to bleach dispenser. Do not use on silk, wool, or leather. Launder as follows. For Home: To mop floors and clean bathrooms, mix in a bucket with hot water. To remove rust, limescale, or soap scum from sinks, toilets, and tubs or to clean grout, sprinkle product and scrub. Safe to mix with our home cleaning products. Do not cover when diluting or mixing with other products.
Product.washing_chart:
This nontoxic alternative to chlorine bleach works wonders to safely remove dirt, stains, and odors. Safe for all colors and fabrics except silk and wool. Most effective when used with hot/warm water.
To Use: Pretreat stains by mixing with Stain Solution to create a paste. Presoak dingy whites, dull colors, and odors by adding 1 capful to a wash basin or sink with hot water and soak. Boost, whiten, and brighten by adding 2 capfuls with detergent to the wash cycle.

Product.name: Delicate Wash
Product.description: We know how tricky it can be to care for delicates. From lingerie and other items labeled dry clean to silk blouses and scarves, this special formula removes perspiration, body oils, and stains while cleaning and preserving fabrics. Ideal for silk, synthetics, spandex, polyester, nylon, rayon, acetate, blends, and more. Why dry clean when you can provide better care for your delicates at home, minus the toxins and extra cost?
Product.short_description: Why dry clean when you can provide better care for your delicates at home, minus the toxins and extra cost?
Product.more_description:
Green Dry Cleaners You Can Use at Home

If you are considering green dry cleaners as an alternative, think about washing your delicates at home. It’s not only good for the earth, but it’s easier on your pocketbook.

Our delicate wash leaves your dry clean laundry sparkling, but without all the nasty chemicals typically associated with dry cleaning. We use herbal blended citrus notes to leave your clothes smelling fresh and clean, as if they’re right off the press. Handle all your dry cleaning in your own home, using natural and safe materials that are as easy on the pocketbook as they are on the earth.

 

Safe and Effective Formula for Washing Delicates

We’ve created the perfect solution for washing delicates. Our sweet-smelling blend of amber, lavender, musk, bergamot, and citrus will leave your delicates clean and fresh without the use of toxic ingredients.

The Laundress Delicate Wash was made with your skin in mind. Its light, nontoxic, and allergen-free formula is safe for sensitive skin and preserves your precious delicates.
Product.meta_description: The Laundress is a collection of specialty detergents, fabric care and accessories for home, travel and storage.
Product.ingredients:
Plant-derived anionic and nonionic surfactants, stain-fighting and cleaning enzymes (protease, amylase, lipase), mineral-derived cleaning enhancers (sodium gluconate and calcium chloride), essential oils, and fragrance
Made with nontoxic, biodegradable, and allergen-free materials. Made with natural ingredients. Color and texture may vary. Free of petroleum, SLS, phosphate, phthalates, and dye. Cruelty-free. No animal by-products. All The Laundress products are tested on Gwen & Lindsey.
Product.for_best_results: We recommend washing silk in cool or warm water. If machine washing, use a delicate washing cycle and insert item in a Mesh Bag (optional). If handwashing, do not soak silk longer than 30 minutes. Lay flat or hang to dry. Never put silk in the dryer. Steam as needed. Launder as follows: Additional Fabric Care To remove stains and odors, pretreat soiled areas with our Stain Solution or Wash & Stain Bar. To keep items fresh between wearing and washing, use our Delicate Spray.
Product.washing_chart:
Pretreat Stain removal: Target areas such as underarms, necklines, and cuffs with the Stain Solution or Wash & Stain Bar. Odors: Add cup of white vinegar to a tepid water bath, and soak item for 30 minutes. Wash with like colors together only to prevent dye transfer.
Handwashing Handwashing is always the best and safest method for treating delicates. Prepare a bath: Fill a wash basin or sink with tepid water and add 2 capfuls or a squirt of Delicate Wash. Submerge item: Gently agitate so your items will be evenly soaped and wet. Soak for up to 30 minutesdo not soak silk for longer. If theres color in the water: This is normal, the dye is simply releasing color. You will not notice any loss of color post wash. Rinse well: Run tepid water through items until rinse water is no longer soapy. Do not wring. Instead, press the water out of your item.
Machine Washing Set machine to the delicate cycle. Make sure the water is cold. Place item, inside out, into a Mesh Washing Bag. Add the appropriate amount of Delicate Wash according to the label. Remove promptly from the washer to reduce creasing. Do not put in the dryer!
Dry/Finish Hang to dry or lay item flat in its natural shape on a drying rack. Most delicate items require steaming. Do not iron! Freshen with Delicate Spray between wearing and washing.
Product.how_to_video_title: How to wash Silk in the machine
Product.how_to_video_description: Get step by step instructions from Gwen & Lindsey on how to use The Laundress Delicate Wash detergent.

Rinse well: Run tepid water through items until rinse water is no longer soapy. Do not wring. Instead, press the water out of your item.
Machine Washing Set machine to the delicate cycle. Make sure the water is cold. Place item, inside out, into a Mesh Washing Bag. Add the appropriate amount of Delicate Wash according to the label. Remove promptly from the washer to reduce creasing. Do not put in the dryer!
Dry/Finish Hang to dry or lay item flat in its natural shape on a drying rack. Most delicate items require steaming. Do not iron! Freshen with Delicate Spray between wearing and washing.

Product.name: Delicate Wash Packet
Product.description: We know how tricky it can be to care for delicates. From lingerie and other items labeled dry clean to silk blouses and scarves, this special formula removes perspiration, body oils, and stains while cleaning and preserving fabrics. Ideal for silk, synthetics, spandex, polyester, nylon, rayon, acetate, blends, and more. Why dry clean when you can provide better care for your delicates at home, minus the toxins and extra cost?
Product.short_description: Headed out of town? The Laundress single use packets are designed to make life easier while away from home. Toss one or more in your handbag, travel bag, or toiletry bag. You never know when you'll need one.

Product.name: Wool & Cashmere Shampoo
Product.description: We are absolute fanatics about the proper care of our beloved sweaters. Safely clean and preserve wool, cashmere, merino, mohair, blends, and more with this specially formulated wash. Why dry clean when you can provide better care for your woolens at home, minus the toxins and extra cost? The Laundress is now an accredited Woolmark partner.
Product.short_description: Safely clean and preserve wool, cashmere, merino, mohair, blends, and more with this specially formulated wash. Why dry clean when you can provide better care for your woolens at home? The Laundress is now an accredited Woolmark partner.
Product.more_description:
How to Wash a Down Pillow Using Wool and Cashmere Shampoo

How do you wash a down pillow? For starters, don’t overload your washer. Wash only a pillow or two at a time, depending on the size of your washer. Pretreat any stains with a stain solution. Then launder on delicate using Wool and Cashmere Shampoo, which ensure the pillow keeps that pearly clean white. Remove the pillow promptly when the load is finished and then tumble dry on a low temperature setting. Make sure the pillows are completely dry. Otherwise, they’ll mildew from the inside out.

DIY with The Laundress Wool & Cashmere Shampoo instead of Dry Cleaning

Safely wash your woolens at home with our Wool & Cashmere Shampoo. Cashmere wash and wool wash are no longer a distant dream! Save time and money by washing your garments at home.

Our Cedar blend naturally repels garment-eating critters, such as moths, with its cedar base while soothing your senses with a combination of rose, sandalwood, and orange.
Product.meta_description: The Laundress is a collection of specialty detergents, fabric care and accessories for home, travel and storage.
Product.ingredients:
Concentrated blend of plant-derived anionic and nonionic surfactants, essential oils, and fragrance
Made with nontoxic, biodegradable, and allergen-free materials. Made with natural ingredients. Color and texture may vary. Free of petroleum, SLS, phosphate, phthalates, and dye. Cruelty-free. No animal by-products. All The Laundress products are tested on Gwen & Lindsey.
The Laundress is now an accredited Woolmark partner.
Product.for_best_results: We recommend handwashing or machine washing in cold water. If machine washing, use a delicate or woolen cycle. Turn item inside out and insert in a Mesh Bag (optional). Lay flat to dry in natural shape. Never use the dryer. Steam as needed. Launder as follows: Additional Fabric Care To remove stains and odor, pretreat soiled areas with our Stain Solution or Wash & Stain Bar. To de-pill, use our Sweater Stone or Sweater Comb. To keep items fresh between wearing and washing, use our Wool & Cashmere Spray.
Product.washing_chart:
Pretreat Stain removal: Target areas such as underarms, necklines, and cuffs with the Stain Solution or Wash & Stain Bar. Odors: Add cup of vinegar to a cool water bath and soak item for 30 minutes. Wash only like colors together to prevent dye transfer.
Handwashing Handwashing is always the best and safest method for treating woolens. Prepare a bath: Fill a wash basin or sink with cool water and add 2 capfuls or a squirt of Wool & Cashmere Shampoo. Submerge item: Gently agitate so your items will be evenly soaped and wet. Soak item: Let the item soak for no longer than 30 minutes at a time. If theres color in the water: This is normal; the yarn dye is simply releasing color. You will not notice any loss of color post wash. Rinse well: Run cool water through items until rinse water is no longer soapy. Do not wring. Instead, press the water out of your item.
Machine Washing Set machine to the woolens/delicate cycle. Make sure the water is cold. Place item in a Mesh Washing Bag, inside out. Add the appropriate amount of Wool & Cashmere Shampoo according to the label. Remove promptly from the washer to reduce creasing. Do not put in the dryer!
Dry/Finish Pre-dry item using a towel: With the item in its original shape, lay flat on a towel. Roll up the item in the towel (like a sleeping bag) to remove excess water. Lay item flat in its natural shape on a drying rack or clean towel. Steam if needed. Do not iron! Ironing will crush or flatten wool's sensitive fibers.
Pills & Lint De-pill delicate knits with the Sweater Comb; the comb is ideal for fine gauge yarns and will handle edges such as cuffs, collars, and waistbands. For heavier gauge items such as knit sweaters, blankets, and upholstery, glide the Sweater Stone over affected areas. Always work tools in one direction. Remove lint, fuzz, and hair with the Cashmere Brush. Brushing between wears will release natural oils that rejuvenate yarns.
Added Care & Storage Freshen items between wearing and washing with the Wool & Cashmere Spray. Always store knits folded to prevent stretching or distorting. Prevent bug and moth infestation by storing in a breathable cotton/canvas bag with a zip closure. Always store items clean to avoid inadvertently providing a food source for bugs.

Product.more_description:
Looking for Green Dry Cleaner? Look No Further.

Why waste time and money carting your delicates, woolens, and precious garments to and from the cleaners, even if they do happen to be a green dry cleaners? The Laundress gives you all the tools needed to safely clean your dry clean items at home or on the go, without the need for toxic chemicals.

We even created a travel size Wool & Cashmere Shampoo so that you can care for your garments with ease wherever you go.

Product.name: Denim Wash
Product.description: We invest a lot in our denim, so it's important to care for it properly. Our unique blend of detergent, fabric softener and color guard cleans and softens while preserving color, leaving your jeans feeling soft and looking finished.
Product.short_description: Our unique blend of detergent, fabric softener and color guard cleans and softens while preserving color, leaving your jeans feeling soft and looking finished.
Product.meta_description: The Laundress is a collection of specialty detergents, fabric care and accessories for home, travel and storage.
Product.ingredients:
Plant-derived anionic and nonionic surfactants, plant-derived softener (canola-based), essential oils, and fragrance
Made with nontoxic, biodegradable, and allergen-free materials. Made with natural ingredients. Color and texture may vary. Free of petroleum, SLS, phosphate, phthalates, and dye. Cruelty-free. No animal by-products. All The Laundress products are tested on Gwen & Lindsey.
Product.for_best_results: Effective in all water temps. We recommend washing colored denim in cool water and white denim in hot water. If machine washing, turn items inside out and insert in a Mesh Bag (optional). Hang dry or tumble dry on low heat. Launder as follows: Additional Fabric Care To remove old and new stains, pretreat soiled areas with our Stain Solution or Wash & Stain Bar. To keep items fresh between wearing and washing, use our Fabric Fresh spray in Classic scent.
Product.washing_chart:
Launder Clean, soften, and preserve color with the Denim Wash. This specially formulated detergent will leave your blue denim with that perfect worn-in feeling.
Whites For white denim thats clean and bright, add 1 capful of All-Purpose Bleach Alternative to load with Denim Wash and launder in hot water.
Dye Dye transfer and bleeding can be a dark reality of raw denim; ALWAYS launder these items separately and youll avoid the blues. To help set dye, presoak dark and raw denim in a cool water bath with Scented Vinegar.
Stains Remove old and new stains with Stain Solutiona pretreat solution! Before laundering, apply directly to stained area(s).
Protect Distressed details can be laundered in the machine: simply turn the item inside out and place in a Mesh Washing Bag to protect it in the cycle.
Dry Avoid the dryer if you can! We always recommend line drying denim to prevent fading, shrinking, and extra wear and tear.
Alterations For perfect results in fit and length, always launder denim prior to making any alterations. Use hot water and a hot dryer cycle to ensure there will be no further shrinkage.
Freshen Its not necessary to launder denim after every wear. Use Fabric Fresh Classic between wearing to keep denim smelling clean and fresh.

Product.name: Sport Detergent
Product.description: We want to smell freshboth during and after a workout. Whether you cycle, swim, run, or Om, this formula works tirelessly to keep activewear in top form, helping to remove perspiration, body odor, and stains. Ideal for all performance fabrics including nylon, spandex, cotton, and synthetics.
Product.short_description: We want to smell freshboth during and after a workout. Whether you cycle, swim, run, or Om, this formula works tirelessly to keep activewear in top form, helping to remove perspiration, body odor, and stains. Ideal for all performance fabrics including nylon, spandex, cotton, and synthetics.
Product.more_description:
Searching for How to Remove Odor from Clothing?

If you simply can’t figure out how to remove odor from clothing, let our Sport Detergent be your sweet-smelling solution. A fresh, crisp blend of leafy greens, orange, rose, and eucalyptus, this detergent can take the funky gym smell out of even the sweatiest of active wear. Tough on body odor, sweat, and stains, our Sport Detergent formula is perfect for all types of workout clothes as well as other items that need some extra odor-fighting power!
Product.meta_description: The Laundress is a collection of specialty detergents, fabric care and accessories for home, travel and storage.
Product.ingredients:
Plant-derived anionic and nonionic surfactants, stain-fighting and cleaning enzymes (protease, amylase, cellulase, lipase), mineral-derived cleaning enhancers (borax, sodium gluconate, and calcium chloride), essential oils, and fragrance
Made with nontoxic, biodegradable, and allergen-free materials. Made with natural ingredients. Color and texture may vary. Free of petroleum, SLS, phosphate, phthalates, and dye. Cruelty-free. No animal by-products. All The Laundress products are tested on Gwen & Lindsey.
Product.for_best_results: For Best Results We recommend washing cotton and heavily soiled/odorous items in hot water. Wash all other fabrics in warm or cold water. If machine washing, turn items inside out. To avoid shrinkage or damage to elasticity, hang to dry or tumble dry on low heat. Launder as follows: Additional Fabric Care To remove old and new stains, pretreat soiled areas with our Stain Solution or Wash & Stain Bar. To remove heavy odors, presoak with our Scented Vinegar. To keep items fresh between wearing and washing, use our Sport Spray.
Product.washing_chart:
Odor-Causing Bacteria Deodorize swimwear, sportswear, and high-tech clothing with 1/4 cup of Scented Vinegar. Add to a hot water bath and soak garments for 30 minutes.
Stain Removal Remove old and new stains, such as discoloring and yellowing underarm stains with the Stain Solution. Apply solution directly to the stained area(s) and soak in a hot water bath.
Tennis Whites & Dingy T-Shirts Maintain whiteness and brightness with the All-Purpose Bleach Alternative. Simply presoak fabrics or add to your wash. A terrific alternative to chlorine bleach, safe for all colors and fabrics except silk and wool.
Protect Items Protect items throughout the wash cycle with the Mesh Washing Bags; these bags will prevent clothing from tearing and snagging in the machine. Theyre the perfect solution for keeping smaller items, such as socks, together in pairs.
Launder Performance Wear Specifically formulated to remove perspiration, body oils, odor, and stains, the Sport Detergent will leave your moisture-wicking, high-tech performance wear smelling clean and fresh.
Swimwear Swimwear is best when hand washed and rinsed (preferably sooner rather than later). Remove chlorine, salt, sand, and sunscreen by laundering and/or pretreating with the Wash & Stain Bar. Wet the bar and gently lather soap throughout the garmentrinse well!
Stay Cool Fabric Softener reduces absorption and wicking capabilitiesdo not use on activewear.
Feel The Burn High heat will reduce the elasticity and moisture-wicking properties of activewear. Embrace the drying rackavoid the dryer!
Air It Out Remove odors and freshen everything from sneakers, gym bags, and lockers to yoga mats and sports equipment with the Sport Spray. To maintain that clean and green scent, spray items between wearings.
Keep Items Dry Use the Wet & Dry Bag to keep wet swimwear and sweaty workout gear separate from the clean, dry items in your bag. Alleviate worry about leakage or spills with this perfect tote for toiletries, makeup, and sunscreen.

Tennis Whites & Dingy T-Shirts Maintain whiteness and brightness with the All-Purpose Bleach Alternative. Simply presoak fabrics or add to your wash. A terrific alternative to chlorine bleach, safe for all colors and fabrics except silk and wool.
Protect Items Protect items throughout the wash cycle with the Mesh Washing Bags; these bags will prevent clothing from tearing and snagging in the machine. Theyre the perfect solution for keeping smaller items, such as socks, together in pairs.
Launder Performance Wear Specifically formulated to remove perspiration, body oils, odor, and stains, the Sport Detergent will leave your moisture-wicking, high-tech performance wear smelling clean and fresh.
Swimwear Swimwear is best when hand washed and rinsed (preferably sooner rather than later). Remove chlorine, salt, sand, and sunscreen by laundering and/or pretreating with the Wash & Stain Bar. Wet the bar and gently lather soap throughout the garmentrinse well!
Stay Cool Fabric Softener reduces absorption and wicking capabilitiesdo not use on activewear.
Feel The Burn High heat will reduce the elasticity and moisture-wicking properties of activewear. Embrace the drying rackavoid the dryer!
Air It Out Remove odors and freshen everything from sneakers, gym bags, and lockers to yoga mats and sports equipment with the Sport Spray. To maintain that clean and green scent, spray items between wearings.
Keep Items Dry Use the Wet & Dry Bag to keep wet swimwear and sweaty workout gear separate from the clean, dry items in your bag. Alleviate worry about leakage or spills with this perfect tote for toiletries, makeup, and sunscreen.

Ideal for all performance fabrics including nylon, spandex, cotton, and synthetics.

Product.name: Le Labo Rose 31 Signature Detergent
Product.description:
A nose in your laundry! Why should the finest perfumes always be condemned to a glass spray bottle? Why should even high-end laundry products merely smell fresh and clean? We know you dont know and neither do we. The Laundress and Le Labo have hence decided to unite and address these incongruities.
The idea? La crme de la crme of detergent formulas perfumed with Le Labos cult range of fragrances. The result? Your favorite sweater or sexy lingerie comes out of the wash clean, with the delicate and ultra-sensual smell of Rose 31. The Laundress and Le Labo are proud to bring this totally new experience to your garment care and expand into this ultimate perfuming gesture!
Product.short_description: We searched high and low for a luxury perfume to pair with our laundry products. The Laundress and Le Labo united to blend the finest of modern perfumery (their Rose 31 fragrance) with our best performing detergent formula. The resulting product single-handedly refines the art of laundry.
Product.more_description:
Natural Laundry Products Enhanced with PERFUME

Looking for natural laundry products that will leave your clothes smelling great? Our La Labo Rose 31 Signature blends natural, biodegradable detergent with perfume, adding a touch of cumin, olibanum, and cedar to the cleanliness of your clothes. All detergent and perfume is naturally biodegradable, using natural enzymes that are ecofriendly. We combine the best in laundry detergent with high end perfumes to create a detergent that reinvents clean.

Product.name: Stain Solution
Product.description: We know how frustrating tough stains can befrom red wine and coffee to pit stains and more. Whether youre rescuing a brand-new shirt or reviving your antique bedding and heirlooms, just one drop of this powerful solution safely removes stubborn stains, old and new. Safe for all washable fabricsboth whites and colors.
Product.short_description: We know how frustrating tough stains can befrom red wine and coffee to pit stains and more. Whether youre rescuing a brand-new shirt or reviving your antique bedding and heirlooms, just one drop of this powerful solution safely removes stubborn stains, old and new. Safe for all washable fabricsboth whites and colors.
Product.more_description:
Stain Solution Packet Works Great to Hand Wash Wool on the Go

Wool sometimes needs a touch up on the go. Our stain solution packet can be the perfect fix when you need to hand wash wool. The nontoxic formula is perfect to use on sweaters and coats to keep fresh in between washes. It uses antibacterial properties to give your wool a fresh smell, removing odors for a perfect clean.

Our stain solution packet is the perfect solution for fixing dry clean only items on the go. It doesn’t have to be a disaster when you’re prepared with an ecofriendly cleaning solution that beats stains.

 

Wondering How to Remove Chocolate and Other Tough Stains?

So, you’re wondering how to remove chocolate, red wine, pet, or ink stains. Don’t worry! We’ve got you covered. The Laundress Stain Solution is safe for all washables and great for removing pesky stains on fabric.

Our Stain Solution conquers stains with a single drop. Order some today to have on hand for your next “Oops” moment!
Product.meta_description: The Laundress is a collection of specialty detergents, fabric care and accessories for home, travel and storage.
Product.ingredients:
Concentrated blend of plant-derived anionic and nonionic surfactants
Made with nontoxic, biodegradable, and allergen-free materials. Made with natural ingredients. Color and texture may vary. Free of petroleum, SLS, phosphate, phthalates, and dye. Cruelty-free. No animal by-products. All The Laundress products are tested on Gwen & Lindsey.
Product.for_best_results: Recommended for all types of stains. Apply directly on stain and launder as normal. For tougher stains, pretreat item with Stain Solution and soak in hot water before laundering. (Use tepid water for silk, wool, or blood stains.) For set-in, stubborn stains, mix with a sprinkle of our All-Purpose Bleach Alternative to create a paste. Then work fabric with our Stain Brush. Soak and repeat as needed. Launder as normal with any of our detergents.
Product.washing_chart:
Formulated to break down stubborn stains such as red wine, sauce, chocolate, grass, coffee/tea, blood, underarm stains, and more. Safe for use on all washable fabrics and colors.
To Use: Apply Stain Solution directly to the stained area(s). Work the solution into the fabric with the Stain Brush. Pour hot water from a height. Allow the item to soak.* If the stain is not completely gone, repeat process until satisfied. Proceed by laundering as normal with the respective detergent. *For stain removal on silk and wool use tepid water. Do not soak silk longer than 30 minutes.
Product.how_to_video_description:
One of The Laundress missions when we started our company was to conquer the Pit Stain.
This is a very common problem and a frustrating one at that.
Fiber scientists conducted laboratory testing with our products at Cornell University to prove that we had a solution for this problem.
The stains (sometimes more yellow, some gray) are from the combination of the natural body oils, deodorant, and fabric absorption.

Product.more_description:
How to Remove Chocolate? Carry Travel Size Stain Solution

Wondering how to remove chocolate? If properly treated, chocolate stains are temporary problems. First treat the area with a stain solution. Its a good idea to carry a travel size in your handbag or purse in case of emergencies. For cotton garments, only use hot water. For silk, wool and delicates use cold. Repeat applying the solution and washing with water until progress is made. Then wash on a regular cycle. Avoid putting the item in the dryer if the stain persists.

Product.name: Wash & Stain Bar
Product.description: The Wash & Stain Bar was designed to clean those hard-to-reach stains from ring around the collar to tricky underarms, delicate straps, and more. We love this product for spot treating clothing and upholstery, hand washing, and laundering on-the-go. Great for travel, airplane friendly.
Product.short_description: The Wash & Stain Bar was designed to clean those hard-to-reach stains from ring around the collar to tricky underarms, delicate straps, and more. We love this product for spot treating clothing and upholstery, hand washing, and laundering on-the-go. Great for travel, airplane friendly.
Product.more_description:
How to Remove Red Wine On the Go

You’ve just toasted your companion over dinner when suddenly an overzealous bus boy (or flight attendant) bumps your arm and—Oops! Red wine spills onto your shirt. But how to remove red wine on the go? Keep our Wash & Stain Bar in your purse, clutch, or suitcase and you’ll be ready to deal with any stain at first spill!

Our formula is safe and effective on white and colored fabrics. Derived from nontoxic, natural ingredients, this product is safe for you, your clothing, and the environment.
Product.meta_description: The Laundress is a collection of specialty detergents, fabric care and accessories for home, travel and storage.
Product.ingredients:
Vegetable soap, borax, essential oils and fragrance
Made with nontoxic, biodegradable, and allergen-free materials. Made with natural ingredients. Color and texture may vary. Free of petroleum, SLS, phosphate, phthalates, and dye. Cruelty-free. No animal by-products. All The Laundress products are tested on Gwen & Lindsey.
Product.for_best_results: For a complete wash; lather with water and soap on the entire item. For stains; lather with water & work soap into stained area. Wipe away excess soap or launder as normal.
Product.washing_chart:
Let the bar do the work to remove stains such as dirt, grease, oil, makeup and ring around the collar. Safe for use on all washable fabrics and colors.
Spot Treat: Upholstery, Dry Clean Only Items, and Bags Wet the bar and gently work into the stained area(s). Remove soap and dirt with a wet Lint-Free Cleaning Clothbe sure to remove all soap. Dampen cloth as needed and repeat the process until satisfied.
Remove Stains: Pretreat Stains Such as Dirt, Grease, Ring Around the Collar, and Cuff Stains Wet the bar and gently work into the stained area(s). Presoak the item or proceed by laundering as normal.
Handwash: Swimsuits, Sportswear, Lingerie, and Travel Laundry Wet the bar and gently lather soap throughout the garment. Fill a wash basin or sink and soak item for 30 minutes. Rinse well: Run tepid water through items until rinse water is no longer soapy. Do not wring. Instead, press the water out of your item.

Product.name: Fabric Conditioner Classic
Product.description:
From shirts to sheets, we love the way fabrics look (and feel!) when they're properly conditioned. Fluff and soften with this plant-derived fabric softener designed to be the perfect complement to our detergents. Decreases drying time, reduces wrinkles, and eases ironing while eliminating static cling.
We recommend this Fabric Conditioner for added scent, softness, and static removal--an excellent alternative to dryer sheets.
Product.short_description: From shirts to sheets, we love the way fabrics look (and feel!) when they're properly conditioned. Fluff and soften with this plant-derived fabric softener designed to be the perfect complement to our detergents. Decreases drying time, reduces wrinkles, and eases ironing while eliminating static cling.
Product.more_description:
We Know How to Fold a Fitted Sheet, and How to Keep It Soft

Here at The Laundress, we make it our business to know how to do everything laundry-oriented from how to fold a fitted sheet to how to keep your bedding lustfully soft.

Our plant derived Fabric Conditioner Classic will have you snuggling up in your bed like never before. Say goodbye to static and hello to sheets that are oh-so soft. And no, you aren’t simply dreaming…

Product.washing_chart:
Wash Before Wearing Always wash baby items before first-time use. Launder with hot water to best remove stains and odor and kill bacteria and germs. Add Fabric Conditioner Baby to fluff, soften, and reduce static.
Secret Stains Playing hide-and-seek with stains is never fun. Formula, breast milk, and spit-up are not always visible until after you wash and dry. Pretreat your clothing and your babys items with Stain Solution to help hinder surprise stains! Play it safeadd 1 capful of All-Purpose Bleach Alternative to every load.
Keep Small Items Together Place small items such as socks, hand mitts, and booties in a Mesh Washing Bag to keep them together throughout the washing and drying cycle.
Softening Gentle on delicate skin and scented in our calming Baby scent, this conditioner softens items while reducing static and wrinkles. Add conditioner to the dispenser for the perfect complement to Baby Detergent.
Cloth Diapers Simply rinse out excess soil with hot water and treat stains with Stain Solution. Follow by presoaking in a wash basin or sink of hot water and 1 capful of All-Purpose Bleach Alternative. Finish by machine washing in hot water with Baby Detergent.
Hand-Me-Downs Hand-me-downs dont have to look worn. For older set-in stains, add 1 capful of All-Purpose Bleach Alternative to a wash basin or sink of hot water and presoak the garment. Follow by washing with Baby Detergent and hot water.
Soft Toys Get your childrens toys looking like new! Eliminate any stains or odor by treating with Stain Solution. To combat older, set-in stains, presoak the toy in a wash basin or sink containing hot water and 1 capful of All-Purpose Bleach Alternative.

Use The Laundress' Wool & Cashmere Spray to Freshen Between each Wool Wash

Our freshening Wool & Cashmere Spray paired with the Wool & Cashmere Shampoo doesn't just make your wool items smell beautifully, its antibacterial properties work to remove odor while adding the warm and spicy smell of cedar. Spritzing this product after each wool wash and between wears will keep items fresh and fragrant.

Laundering after every wear can decrease the lifespan of garments. Spritz with Wool & Cashmere Spray instead, to reduce the number of washes and deter frequent trips to the dry cleaner.

Product.name: Sport Spray
Product.description: We love to smell freshboth during and after a workout. Whether you cycle, swim, run, or Om, this nontoxic formula with antibacterial properties adds scent while removing odor. Spray to freshen activewear and equipment between uses. Ideal for gym bags, helmets, sneakers, ski boots, yoga mats, and other sports gear.
Product.short_description: We love to smell freshboth during and after a workout. Whether you cycle, swim, run, or Om, this nontoxic formula with antibacterial properties adds scent while removing odor. Spray to freshen activewear and equipment between uses. Ideal for gym bags, helmets, sneakers, ski boots, yoga mats, and other sports gear.
Product.more_description:
On the Go, Spray On Fabric Care for the Athlete

Break a sweat without the stink. Our Sport Spray offers on the go fabric care that removes the odors of a workout. Freshen gym equipment, work out clothes right there in the locker room to remove those stinky odors. Its nontoxic and antibacterial, infusing your clothes with clean. The Sport Sprays small size is perfect for gym bags and traveling.
Product.meta_description: The Laundress is a collection of specialty detergents, fabric care and accessories for home, travel and storage.
Product.ingredients:
Deionized water, alcohol, essential oils, and fragrance
Made with nontoxic, biodegradable, and allergen-free materials. Made with natural ingredients. Color and texture may vary. Free of petroleum, SLS, phosphate, phthalates, and dye. Cruelty-free. No animal by-products. All The Laundress products are tested on Gwen & Lindsey.
Product.for_best_results: Spray sportswear and gear after each use from 6 inches away. Safe for all fabrics and equipment.
Product.washing_chart:
Odor-Causing Bacteria Deodorize swimwear, sportswear, and high-tech clothing with 1/4 cup of Scented Vinegar. Add to a hot water bath and soak garments for 30 minutes.
Stain Removal Remove old and new stains, such as discoloring and yellowing underarm stains with the Stain Solution. Apply solution directly to the stained area(s) and soak in a hot water bath.
Tennis Whites & Dingy T-Shirts Maintain whiteness and brightness with the All-Purpose Bleach Alternative. Simply presoak fabrics or add to your wash. A terrific alternative to chlorine bleach, safe for all colors and fabrics except silk and wool.
Protect Items Protect items throughout the wash cycle with the Mesh Washing Bags; these bags will prevent clothing from tearing and snagging in the machine. Theyre the perfect solution for keeping smaller items, such as socks, together in pairs.
Launder Performance Wear Specifically formulated to remove perspiration, body oils, odor, and stains, the Sport Detergent will leave your moisture-wicking, high-tech performance wear smelling clean and fresh.
Swimwear Swimwear is best when hand washed and rinsed (preferably sooner rather than later). Remove chlorine, salt, sand, and sunscreen by laundering and/or pretreating with the Wash & Stain Bar. Wet the bar and gently lather soap throughout the garmentrinse well!
Stay Cool Fabric Softener reduces absorption and wicking capabilitiesdo not use on activewear.
Feel The Burn High heat will reduce the elasticity and moisture-wicking properties of activewear. Embrace the drying rackavoid the dryer!
Air It Out Remove odors and freshen everything from sneakers, gym bags, and lockers to yoga mats and sports equipment with the Sport Spray. To maintain that clean and green scent, spray items between wearings.
Keep Items Dry Use the Wet & Dry Bag to keep wet swimwear and sweaty workout gear separate from the clean, dry items in your bag. Alleviate worry about leakage or spills with this perfect tote for toiletries, makeup, and sunscreen.

Product.name: Sweater Stone
Product.description: This natural volcanic Sweater Stone easily removes unsightly pills renewing the finish of heavier-knit sweaters, blankets, upholstery, and more. The gentle pumice picks up pills while leaving renewed yarns behind.
Product.short_description: This natural volcanic Sweater Stone easily removes unsightly pills renewing the finish of heavier-knit sweaters, blankets, upholstery, and more. The gentle pumice picks up pills while leaving renewed yarns behind.
Product.meta_description: The Laundress is a collection of specialty detergents, fabric care and accessories for home, travel and storage.
Product.ingredients: Natural volcanic pumice
Product.for_best_results:
Simply, glide the stone across any woolen surface with pilling. The stone delicately picks up loose fibers and yarn. Pilling is a natural occurrence from friction. Typically this is under the arms, where you hold your handbag, in the back from sitting. This stone will work not only on clothing but also upholstery.
After each use, shake access pumice out and remove the collected lint from the stone.
Product.made_of: Natural volcanic pumice, cardboard reusable sleeve. Made in the USA.
Product.how_to_video_title: How to use the Sweater Stone
Product.how_to_video_description: We know how frustrating it can be to see pilling on your knitted or woven fabrics. This is why we're introducing the Sweater Stone--our favorite tool to remove unsightly pilling and renew the finish of sweaters, blankets, upholstery and more. The Laundress Sweater Stone is an easy, convenient and environmentally safe way to remove pilling. Renew your clothes to that "just-bought" look. Save time and money on professional dry-cleaning.

Product.washing_chart:
Make Up Blush on your shoulder? Apply the Wash & Stain Bar with water to remove.
Cocktails Try white wine on your red wine stains and other drinks while youre out, otherwise use a small amount of Stain Solution with water to remove. Soak the next day to remove thoroughly.
Candle Wax Hot wax can be cleaned off quickly with a blow dryer. Solid wax should be ironed with a cloth between the fabric and iron. As soon as youre home, pretreat with Stain Solution and launder with your favorite Laundress detergent in your machine.
Greasy Dips & Dressings Ask your host or hostess for table salt, cornstarch or baby powder to lift up the stain. Treat further with Stain Solution at home.
Tree Sap Rub the tree sap with an ice cube and then gently scrape off the excess sap. Apply the Wash & Stain Bar and launder at home.
Deodorant Marks Rub the marks on your outfit back & forth against the inside fabric & they will be gone!
Salt, Slush & Snow Take a damp cloth to blot the cuffs, hems or other affected areas. Do not use a napkin, tissue or paper towel as they will leave a lint trail behind. Use Stain Solution to further remove at home.
Freshen Up Freshen up with the Fabric Fresh anti-bacterial spray! Just spray onto your clothes - from cotton to silk and youll smell fresh in no time.
Static Cling Spray Static Solution in between your stockings & clothes and the static will be gone.
No Time to Iron Be wrinkle-free in no time! Spray Crease Release for simple wrinkle removal. Spray 6 inches from fabric, pat and dry.

Product.name: Scented Vinegar
Product.description: Vinegar is known for its powerful cleansing properties that fight stains, buildup, odors, and germs. However, it's also known for its off-putting "vinegary" smell. Combining our popular No247 scent with 100% natural vinegar, this multi-purpose product will leave your home smelling fresh and clean. Get glassware to sparkle, easily remove bathtub film, effectively tackle messes and odors in the kitchen, and discover more surprising uses for all-natural cleaning.
Product.short_description: Vinegar is known for its powerful cleansing properties that fight stains, buildup, odors, and germs. However, it's also known for its off-putting "vinegary" smell. Combining our popular No247 scent with 100% natural vinegar, this multi-purpose product will leave your home smelling fresh and clean.
Product.more_description:
How to Remove Odor from Clothing? The Magic of Vinegar

Wondering how to remove odor from clothing? Try a scented vinegar cleaner. It does wonders at removing odors. Presoak the clothing items in a vinegar solution for up to an hour. Vinegar is known for its powerful ability to remove odors, but many people hate that vinegary smell that tends to linger. Our scented vinegar provides an extra scent so your cloths are left odor free and clean smelling, without smelling like a vat of French fries.
Product.meta_description: The Laundress is a collection of specialty detergents, fabric care and accessories for home, travel and storage.
Product.ingredients:
Deionized water, natural corn derived vinegar, essential oils and fragrance
Made with nontoxic, biodegradable, and allergen-free materials. Made with natural ingredients. Color and texture may vary. Free of petroleum, chlorine bleach, ammonia, phosphate, dye, and SLS. Cruelty-free. No animal by-products. All The Laundress products are tested on Gwen & Lindsey.
Product.for_best_results:
To clean, deodorize, or sanitize surfaces, glassware, and household items, wet a Lint-Free Cleaning Cloth or sponge with Scented Vinegar. Then wipe away dirt, stains, germs, and streaks.
To remove odor from fabric, add 2 capfuls of Scented Vinegar to a basin of warm water and soak the item for 30 minutes. Then wash as normal. Or, add 1 cup Scented Vinegar directly to the washing machine drum (for top loaders) or into the detergent dispenser (for front loaders) and run a wash cycle using no detergent or softener. Then wash again as normal.
To deodorize a room, fill a bowl with Scented Vinegar and leave uncovered for 24 hours.
Product.washing_chart:
Remove Odor From Fabrics Remove pesky odors that just won't come out in the wash. For all washable fabrics including wool, silk, blends, and more.
Pretreat: To remove odor from fabric, add cup of Scented Vinegar to a basin of warm water and soak the item for 30 minutes. Then launder as normal.
Launder: Add 1 cup Scented Vinegar directly to the washing machine drum (for top loaders) or to the detergent dispenser (for front loaders) and run a wash cycle using no detergent or softener. Then wash again as normal.
Deodorize Rooms & Appliances Cooking/Kitchen: Remove cooking odors by simmering a small pot of cup vinegar and water or keep a small bowl of vinegar on the counter to absorb odor.
Refrigerator: Place 1 cup vinegar in the refrigerator for two days to remove odor. Refresh as needed.
Microwave: Use cup vinegar and 1 cup water; bring to a boil and let sit.
Machine Odor Washing Machine: Add cup Scented Vinegar mixed with 2 capfuls All-Purpose Bleach Alternative to your machine dispenser and run an empty, long load with hot water. Dont forget to clean out your fabric softener and bleach dispensers!
Dishwasher: Fill your dispenser with Scented Vinegar and add 2 capfuls All-Purpose Bleach Alternative to the machine, then run an empty load with hot water.
Rinse Aid To prevent spotty glassware, add vinegar to the rinse aid dispenser in your dishwasher.
Drain Cleaner To clean, deodorize, and unclog drains, sprinkle cup of All-Purpose Bleach Alternative and pour 1 cup of boiling vinegar down the drain. Allow the solution to sit for 5 minutes, then run hot water down the drain. (For garbage disposals, halve the amounts.)
Remove Bacteria, Mold & Yeast Growth Cutting Boards: Apply vinegar directly to cutting boards at the end of the evening and do not rinse.
Surfaces: To clean and deodorize surfaces, glassware, and household items, wet a Lint-Free Cleaning Cloth or sponge with Scented Vinegar. Then wipe away dirt, stains, germs, and streaks. (This will also keep ants and bugs away.)
Cleaning: To scrub tubs, tiles, toilets, and stained porcelain, mix the Scented Vinegar with All-Purpose Bleach Alternative.
Toilets: Deodorize toilets with 1 cup vinegar; let sit for 30 minutes and then flush.
Clean Blinds & Walls To clean blinds and walls, mix equal parts vinegar and water in a pail and use a sponge or Lint-Free Cleaning Cloth to wipe down.
Mop Pergo "Wood" Floors Add cup Scented Vinegar to 1 gallon of water to mop and clean Pergo floors. Avoid other floor cleaners, all-purpose cleaners, and wax as these will leave a film behind.
Product.how_to_video_title: How to clean your iron with Scented Vinegar

Product.name: Dish Detergent
Product.description: We created a single, low-sudsing detergent to thoroughly clean your dishes whether you're washing them by hand or in the dishwasher. That's one less bottle to store under your sink! Formulated with a high percentage of active ingredients, including natural cleaning enzymes, this unique product works on contact to remove grease, baked-on food, and cooking messes. Gentle on hands, yet easily tackles dried smoothie remnants, well-loved bakeware, and more. Both you and your dishes will be gleaming.

Made with nontoxic, biodegradable, and allergen-free materials. Made with natural ingredients. Color and texture may vary. Free of petroleum, chlorine bleach, ammonia, phosphate, dye, and SLS. Cruelty-free. No animal by-products. All The Laundress products are tested on Gwen & Lindsey.
Product.for_best_results:
For Hand Washing Dishes

Fill a basin with hot water. Add a squirt of detergent to create a suds bath. Wash dishes, then rinse. Or, add a small squirt of detergent to a sponge or our Dish Brush. Then lather with hot water and rinse.

For Dishwashers

Add ONLY one capful of detergent to your dispenser. Do not overfill as this product is highly concentrated. Always separate stainless steel from silver when washing. We recommend washing pewter, fine china, and crystal by hand.

Additional Care
To remove tough stains from dishware, add a squirt of detergent to a basin of hot water and soak for 30 minutes. Then wash by hand or in the dishwasher. To remove spots from glassware, try our Scented Vinegar.

Wool Detergent? Check. But Where to Wash?

We hope you love our Wool & Cashmere Shampoo or wool detergent, but if you’re still handwashing your woolens in the sink or bathtub, it’s time you upgrade your laundering routine!

The Laundress Wash Tub Basin is just the right size for handwashing woolens and delicates, and for presoaking garments before stain removal.

Do not clean in the dishwasher.

Product.ingredients:
Plant-derived anionic and nonionic surfactants, stain-fighting and cleaning enzymes (protease, amylase, cellulase, lipase), mineral-derived cleaning enhancers (borax, sodium gluconate, and calcium chloride), essential oils, and fragrance

For extra softening, static control, and wrinkle reduction, follow with our Fabric Conditioner in No. 10.

Product.name: Hanging Garment Bag
Product.description:
The Hanging Garment Bag is an absolute must for storing seasonal coats, suits, furs, dresses, and more. Featuring a full-length side zipper for easy access, a 3" gusset for maximum expansion, and a top opening that fits any hanger, this garment bag flexes to your every need.
The clear, plastic sleeve makes it easy to label bag contents so you'll know what's inside at a glance. Gone are the days of tearing through your closet looking for a missing dress. Headed on the road? Swap out the label for an identification card to prevent mixups. Whether you're in transit or at home, this breathable cotton bag will keep your items safe from critters, dust, and discoloration.
Dimensions: 24" x 58" x 3"
